actions.description: The warlock makes two Rapier attacks, or it uses Bewildering Word twice.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) piercing damage.
actions.name: Rapier

actions.description: The warlock utters a magical bewilderment, targeting one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or take 9 (2d8) psychic damage and have disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of the warlock's next turn.
actions.name: Bewildering Word

actions.description:
The warlock casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14):
At will: dancing lights, disguise self, mage armor (self only), mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, speak with animals

1/day each: charm person, dimension door, hold monster
actions.name: Spellcasting
